name: Street Fighter Boxing 3D: Be a King of fighters game 2016
name_original: Street Fighter Boxing 3D: Be a King of fighters game 2016
description:
Street Fighter Boxing 3D is incredible 3d fighting simulation game. Instead of fighting in the ring it brings the more causal way to fight for death.

Choose your favorite fighter, Customize it and fight well in the arena. Game is enriched with super easy controls and realistic simulations.

There are FIGHT RULES in the game. Fight hard and kill your opponent before he kills you.
